content.en: Optimization algorithm comparison: A set of scientific abstracts analyzed the performance of various algorithms in solving optimization problems. The algorithms, such as Weighted QPSO, QPSO-TS, GAQPSO, DQPSO, MSQPSO, NQPSO, EQPSO, EB-QPSO, and others, were compared to standard PSO and QPSO. The results showed that these improved algorithms consistently outperformed the standard ones in terms of search ability, convergence, avoiding local optima, global search capability, solution accuracy, diversity, and convergence speed.
content.da: Optimeringsalgoritme-sammenligning: Et sæt videnskabelige abstracts analyserede ydeevnen af forskellige algoritmer i løsning af optimeringsproblemer. Algoritmerne, såsom Weighted QPSO, QPSO-TS, GAQPSO, DQPSO, MSQPSO, NQPSO, EQPSO, EB-QPSO og andre, blev sammenlignet med standard PSO og QPSO. Resultaterne viste, at disse forbedrede algoritmer konsekvent overgik de standardiserede med hensyn til søgeevne, konvergens, undgåelse af lokale optima, global søgekapacitet, løsningsnøjagtighed, diversitet og konvergenshastighed.
